title: World War One: the Australian home front
brief_description: This program suitable for secondary school students in years 10-12 or aged 15-18 shows some of the photographic evidence of Australia during World War I. Using contemporary film footage, photographs and re-enactments of battles made after the war, the video traces events during the war years and the Australian reaction to them.
